t:
Although disgusted, but to complete my dare, I ate the large bee my friends found.


Trapped inside the car, with the bees buzzing on the windows, I realized that it was a mistake.

The hive will always
follow the queen.
c:
I don't understand, if I'm the queen why ain't they beehive-ing?



#dare #bee #eat #beehive #follow #trapped #queen #revenge
